title: Simulation-based High-speed/High-Accuracy Data Center Workload/System Analysis Platform
short_description: Development of optimal server-architecture exploration algorithms for efficient execution of simulation-based LLM workloads

title: PIM-NPU Based Processing System Software Developments for Hyper-scale Artificial Neural Network Processing
short_description: Development of profiling performance-analysis techniques and monitoring tools for NPU-PIM heterogeneous systems

title: Memory-Centric Architecture Using the Reconfigurable PIM Devices
short_description: Porting LLM models to multi-PIM–based server systems, measuring execution performance, and developing a PIM software integration framework

title: Development of image processing SoC for AI based dynamic vision sensor capable of tracking image variance
short_description: Development of a spiking-neural-network–based object detection model for event-camera–based data-stream processing and construction of an SoC integration demo platform

title: The development of High efficient low power circuit element and SoC for the light weight edge device
short_description: Development of quantization and execution-optimization techniques for classification and object-detection models on edge NPUs

title: Development of AI 3D IC Fabrication Process Technology using a FO Package
short_description: Development of system software—including model conversion techniques for executing CNN and binarized neural network models on NPUs—and an integrated software platform for training and inference

title: Development of SoC technology based on Spiking Neural Cell for smart mobile and IoT Devices
short_description: Development of training and inference software and hardware co-execution technologies for various spike-based neural networks, such as STDP and TSSL-BP

title: Brain-Inspired Neuromorphic Perception and Learning Processor
short_description: Development of a software platform for execution data capturing and profiling of DNN-Caffe–based classification and object-detection networks
